inputs_pretokenized:
设$n$为正整数，求极限：$\lim_{x\rightarrow+\infty}\left[\frac{x^n}{\left(x-1\right)\left(x-2\right)\cdots\left(x-n\right)}\right]^x=$____
A. $e^{\frac{(n-1)(n+1)}{2}}$
B. $e^{\frac{(n-1)n}{2}}$
C. $e^{\frac{n(n+1)}{2}}$
D. $e^{\frac{n^{2}}{2}}$

设平面区域$D$由直线$y=\frac{1}{2}x-\frac{1}{2\sqrt{5}}$、$y=2x-\frac{2}{\sqrt{5}}$和$y=x$围成，函数$z=3xy+3$在$D$上的最大值和最小值分别是M和m，则____
A. $M=6,m=3$
B. $M=\dfrac{27}{5},m=3$
C. $M=\dfrac{18}{5},m=3$
D. $M={\frac{27}{5}},m={\frac{117}{40}}$

设函数$f\left(x\right)$连续，且$f\left(x\right)>0$，求积分：$int_0^1{\ln f\left(x+t\right)}\mathrm{d}t=$____
A. $\int_0^x{\ln \frac{f\left( t+2 \right)}{f\left( t \right)}}\mathrm{d}t+\int_0^1{\ln f\left( t \right)}\mathrm{d}t$
B. $\int_0^1{\ln \frac{f\left( t+2 \right)}{f\left( t \right)}}\mathrm{d}t+\int_0^1{\ln f\left( t \right)}\mathrm{d}t$
C. $\int_0^2x{\ln \frac{f\left( t+1 \right)}{f\left( t \right)}}\mathrm{d}t+\int_0^1{\ln f\left( t \right)}\mathrm{d}t$
D. $\int_0^x{\ln \frac{f\left( t+2 \right)}{f\left( t \right)}}\mathrm{d}t+\int_0^1{\ln f\left( t \right)}\mathrm{d}t$

设有界区域$\Omega$由平面$2x+y+2z=2$与三个坐标平面围成，$\Sigma$为整个表面的外侧；\\计算曲面积分：$I=\iint_{\Sigma}{\left(x^2+1\right)\mathrm{d}y\mathrm{d}z-2y\mathrm{d}z\mathrm{d}x+3z\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y}=$____
A. $\frac{1}{2}$
B. 1
C. $\frac{3}{2}$
D. $\frac{5}{2}$

已知$\int_0^{+\infty}{\frac{\sin x}{x}\mathrm{d}x=\frac{\pi}{2}}$，则$\int_0^{+\infty}{\int_0^{+\infty}{\frac{\sin x\sin\left(x+y\right)}{x\left(x+y\right)}}}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y$=____
A. $\frac{\pi ^2}{12}$
B. $\frac{\pi ^2}{8}$
C. $\frac{\pi ^2}{4}$
D. $\frac{\pi ^2}{2}$

设曲线$C=\left\{(x,y,z):x={\sqrt{3}}\cos(t),y={\sqrt{3}}\sin(t),z={\frac{2}{3}}t^{\frac{3}{2}},0\leq t\leq5\right\}$，则曲线积分$\int_C(x^2+y^2)\mathrm{d}s=$____
A. $\frac{3}{4}\left(16\sqrt{2}-3\sqrt{3}\right)$
B. $2\bigl(16\sqrt{2}-3\sqrt{3}\bigr)$
C. $\frac{9}{4}\left(16\sqrt{2}-3\sqrt{3}\right)$
D. $\frac{3}{2}\left(16\sqrt{2}-3\sqrt{3}\right)$

计算二重积分:$\iint_D{x\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y}=$.其中$D$为由直线$y=-x+2,x$轴以及曲线$y=\sqrt{2x-x^2}$所围成的平面区域.____
A. $\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{1}{3}$
B. $\frac{\pi}{2}+\frac{1}{3}$
C. $\frac{\pi}{2}+\frac{1}{4}$
D. $\frac{\pi}{2}+\frac{2}{3}$

求$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{\left(-1\right)^{n+1}-2^n}{n}x^n}$的和函数.____
A. $\ln\left(1-2x-x^2\right),x\in\left[-\dfrac{1}{2},\dfrac{1}{2}\right)$
B. $\ln\left(1-x-x^2\right),x\in\left(-\dfrac{1}{2},\dfrac{1}{2}\right)$
C. $\ln\left(1-2x-2x^2\right),x\in\left[-\dfrac{1}{2},\dfrac{1}{2}\right)$
D. $\ln\left(1-x-2x^2\right),x\in\left[-\dfrac{1}{2},\dfrac{1}{2}\right)$

求极限：$\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{\sqrt{1+x\cos x}-\sqrt{1+\sin x}}{x^3}=$____
A. $-\dfrac{1}{3}$
B. $-\dfrac{1}{4}$
C. $-\dfrac{1}{5}$
D. $-\dfrac{1}{6}$

已知曲线C是圆$(x-1)^{2}+(y-6)^{2}=25$上从点$A(1,1)$沿逆时针方向到$B(4,2)$的一段弧，则$\oint_{C}(3\ln(1+y)+5x^{2})\mathrm{d}x+\Bigl({\frac{3x}{1+y}}-2y\Bigr)\mathrm{d}y=$____
A. $108+3\ln\Bigl(\frac{27}{2}\Bigr)$
B. $3\ln\left(\dfrac{81}{2}\right)-102$
C. $102+3\ln\Bigl(\frac{81}{2}\Bigr)$
D. $3\ln\left(\dfrac{27}{2}\right)-97$

设$D$是全平面，$f\left(x\right)=\begin{cases}
x\text{，}-1\leq x\leq2\\
0\text{，}\text{其他}\\
\end{cases}$；计算$\iint_D{f\left(x\right)f\left(x^2-y\right)}\mathrm{d}\sigma=$____
A. $\frac{9}{4}$
B. $\frac{5}{2}$
C. $\frac{11}{4}$
D. 3

计算广义积分：$\int_0^{+\infty}{\frac{\mathrm{d}x}{\left(1+x^2\right)\left(1+x^4\right)}}$____
A. $\frac{\pi}{8}$
B. $\frac{\pi}{4}$
C. $\frac{\pi}{2}$
D. $\frac{\pi}{3}$

已知数列$\left\{a_n\right\}$，其中$a_n=\cos n\alpha$，其前$n$$项和为$S_n$.求：$S_n=$____
A. $\frac{\cos \frac{n}{2}\alpha \cdot \sin \frac{n\alpha}{2}}{\sin \frac{\alpha}{2}}$
B. $\frac{\cos \frac{n+1}{2}\alpha \cdot \sin \frac{n\alpha}{2}}{\sin \frac{\alpha}{2}}$
C. $\frac{\cos \frac{n+1}{2}\alpha \cdot \sin \frac{n\alpha}{2}}{\sin \frac{\alpha}{3}}$
D. $\frac{\cos \frac{n-1}{2}\alpha \cdot \sin \frac{n\alpha}{2}}{\sin \frac{\alpha}{2}}$

计算定积分：$\int_{-1}^1{\frac{\mathrm{d}x}{\left(1+\mathrm{e}^x\right)\left(1+x^2\right)}}$____
A. $\frac{\pi}{8}$
B. $\frac{\pi}{4}$
C. $\frac{\pi}{2}$
D. $\pi$

求极限：$\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{\tan2x^2-x^2}{\sin x^2+3x^2}=$____
A. $\frac{1}{2}$
B. $\frac{1}{4}$
C. $\frac{1}{8}$
D. $\frac{3}{5}$
